mapper.insert: INSERT INTO soso.letter( userId, letterContent, letterFont, letterFontColor, letterPaper, letterWriter, letterIcon, letterWriteDate, letterReadYn, letterDelYn) VALUES (#{userId}, #{letterContent}, #{letterFont}, #{letterFontColor}, #{letterPaper}, #{letterWriter}, #{letterIcon}, CURRENT_TIMESTAMP, #{letterReadYn}, #{letterDelYn})
INSERT INTO soso.STICKER(letterId, stickerIcon, stickerX, stickerY) VALUES (#{letterId}, #{stickerIcon}, #{stickerX}, #{stickerY})
mapper.select: SELECT letterId FROM soso.letter WHERE userId = #{userId}
mapper.update: UPDATE soso.MEMEBER SET userGetLetterCount = userGetLetterCount+1 WHERE userId = #{userId}
